charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
a mountain trail, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Leaf and Moltres
taking a rest.
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_0200_1:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s another perfect day for an adventure!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_0401_0400_1:
Hehe, maybe because Moltres has been giving
its all!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_0302_0500_1: Looks like Moltres is in good shape!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_0402_0600_1:
I’m impressed you can tell! We’ve been giving it
our all!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_0700_1:
You know that Moltres is a Legendary
Pokémon, right?
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_0800_1:
I’m not sure if it’s because of that, but lots of sync
pairs have been challenging us to battle!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_0900_1:
It’s been tough, but there’s no way I’d turn down
a battle, you know?
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_1000_1: That being said, we’re taking a little break today!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_1100_1: We’re actually here to see the flowers.
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_0401_1300_1:
Yeah! Just looking at cute things makes me feel
at ease!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_0402_1500_1: Hmm, I’m not sure... But I hope it does!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_1600_1: Did you know there’s a tale about Moltres?
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_1700_1:
Supposedly, the flap of its wings brings
about spring!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_1800_1:
Spring is when flowers start to bud, right? Maybe
with Moltres’s help, I can find my favorite flower!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_1900_1: *chuckle* Seems Moltres is in a good mood, too!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_2000_1:
Moltres and I became partners while I was
traveling through Kanto.
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_2100_1:
But we haven’t spent much time together compared
to my other Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_2200_1:
That’s why I chose it as my partner Pokémon—so
we can get closer while we’re on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_2300_1:
From now on, I hope Moltres and I share lots of
exciting moments together!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_2400_1:
Like discovering types of flowers you can’t find in
Kanto, for example!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_0401_2600_1: Hm? Seems Moltres is curious about you...
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_0402_2800_1: Hm? Are you all pumped up, Moltres?
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_2900_1: Maybe it wants to test your strength!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_3000_1:
Its eyes looked like that back when I challenged it
to become my partner, too!
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_3100_1:
Ah, the memories... It must be curious what you
can do.
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_3200_1: All right, now that I’ve had plenty of time to rest...
charaepi_ch0017_90_leaf/2301_1201_3300_1: Shall we have a Pokémon battle?
